thread.title: Guy makes impressive real life prototypes of superhero weapons and breaks sh*t with them
thread.title_full: Guy makes impressive real life prototypes of superhero weapons and breaks sh*t with them

author: Alex
title: Guy makes impressive real life prototypes of superhero weapons and breaks sh*t with them
text:
View as Slideshow 1 
Don’t call it cosplay. YouTube channel the Hacksmith specializes in making real working prototypes of superhero weapons and gadgets. The man who news stations have called “the Canadian Tony Stark” has built everything from Captain America’s electromagnetic shield and Batman’s grappling hook to Wolverine’s claws and the exoskeleton from Call of Duty . Here are some of his coolest movie, comic book, and video game inspired creations. 2 
Wolverine claws (hooked up to electricity) 3 
Psylocke’s Psionic Sword (X-Men: Apocalypse) 4 
Reinhardt’s Rocket Hammer (Overwatch) 5
